title: iDigital
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: I have early Alzheimer’s and my husband has stage 4 kidney disease. We just inherited $50K. How can this help us?
items.description: “We have a 401(k) with $20,000, and $29,000 in a Roth IRA.”

items.title: Trump says Coke with cane sugar is on its way. But Americans seem fine with the current version.
items.description: Some studies reveal a preference for Coke produced just as it is — with high-fructose corn syrup.

items.title: Can my husband contest his late brother’s $600K will? He experienced oxygen deprivation due to COPD before he died.
items.description: “Around 30 days before passing, he changed everything to go to a friend.”

items.description: Citi anticipates sideways trading in the dollar, but remains bearish further out.
